Game.Name: Dokodemo Taikyoku - Yakuman Advance (Japan) (Rev 1)
Game.plot: Dokodemo Taikyoku: Yakuman Advance is an Adventure game, developed by Nd Cube and published by Nintendo,which was released in Japan in 2001.Cheat: Unlock Hiromi , HIDE, and Komii (Teacher) in free modeTo unlock Hiromi, play one whole game in free mode with ''Technical Support'' function disabled. Hiromi will become the default personality for the ''Technical Support'' function. To unlock Komii, beat levels 1-5 of Normal Challenge Mode. Komii will also become an available personality for the ''Technical Support'' function. To unlock HIDE, beat level 5 of HIDE Challenge mode.Cheat: Unlock Hiromi , HIDE, and Komii (Teacher) in free modeScores are to be achieved in ranking mode.
